file_content.text: Don't kill me! You've got to understand, I had no choice!
You should take responsibility for your own decisions.
There's always a choice.
Why, exactly, shouldn't I shoot you?
Talk or I fire.
I hope they paid you in credits. Imperials don't honor their IOUs.
I understand perfectly.
I don't want to hear it.
Please, just hear me out!
You'll face a court-martial for what you've done.
I'm not going to kill you.
The Republic is looking for some prototype that crashed here. The thing probably burned up in the atmosphere! We're never going to find it!
With the Republic, the only way I leave Hoth is in a body bag. The Empire offered to ship me back to the Core!
Did the Empire's offer specify you'd be "alive"?
And you believed them?
It was more of a chance than what the Republic was offering me!
You agreed to help kill me and everyone at Aurek Base, and I shouldn't kill you because...?
And why shouldn't I kill you?
Because you're... so much nobler than I am?
That's enough.
What... what happens to me now?
I'll have someone come get you.
Stay here. [Lock him up.]
Wait, you're--
Lieutenant, send someone to pick up Private Falk. And tell them to keep an eye on him.
Havoc Squad reporting. I need someone to escort Private Falk to his holding cell.
Lieutenant, you might want to keep a closer eye on your men. I've got Private Falk here.
Falk? What the--?
There's a strike team on its way. That's another one I owe you, I guess. Thanks.
You're leaving me on Hoth? Couldn't you just shoot me?
You've done enough damage.
You're through. [Kill him.]
No!
Thank goodness I got to you in time!
You're walking into a trap! The Ortolans have betrayed us.
I knew I shouldn't have listened to that little blue creep.
I knew it!
He's sent you straight into an Imperial ambush.
You were at Aurek Base, weren't you? How did you get here ahead of me?
How did you get here so fast?
The, ah, lieutenant sent me here right after you left.
We intercepted a transmission from Supervisor Aldogh to Korl Torin, telling him you were on your way.
Good to know.
You overheard this right after I left? As in, before I even got to Crescent Canyon?
But that doesn't make sense.
Something about this stinks, and I'm pretty sure it's you.
I don't believe you.
What?
The Ortolans have cut a deal with the Empire. They get this facility in exchange for handing you over.
Well, I don't intend to be handed over, so how do we put a stop to this?
What do we do, then?
They're setting up an ambush just a little further down the tunnel.
If you hurry, you can catch them before they're ready.
Are you certain?
Ah... well....
There's no way the Ortolans would betray me.
I don't buy it.
I was hoping you'd cooperate, but I guess we'll do this the other way.
